entries.title: How Should You Cut Through the Noise of This Year’s Headlines?
entries.description: WIRED's editor in chief reflects on a cacophonous year in Big Tech, crypto, and more, and predicts where 2023 may lead.

entries.title: A New Lawsuit Accuses Meta of Inflaming Civil War in Ethiopia
entries.description: The suit claims the company lacks adequate moderation to prevent widespread hate speech that has led to violence and death.
